org.opt4j.satdecoding

Class SATGenotype

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.opt4j.core.genotype.CompositeGenotype<java.lang.Integer,Genotype>
      • org.opt4j.satdecoding.SATGenotype
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Iterable<java.util.Map.Entry<java.lang.Integer,Genotype>>, Genotype

    public class SATGenotype
extends CompositeGenotype<java.lang.Integer,Genotype>
    Specialized Genotype for the AbstractSATDecoder. The SATGenotype consists of two components: a binary and a double vector.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      SATGenotype()
      Constructs a SATGenotype with empty vectors.
      SATGenotype(BooleanGenotype booleanVector, DoubleGenotype doubleVector)
      Constructs a SATGenotype with the given vectors.
